Html:
Can i play file by giving a url from any of the site.

For eg,

http://songs.mastemag.com/indian-movie-songs/L/download.php?get=2cdeb5bfb354f297e97ba6b6b3b53203&file=1/love-aaj-kal/01%20~%20Twist%20(MastiMag.com).mp3

Hi ravik4u,

Have you tried the Mp3FileReader passing in the URL and seeing what happens? I haven't tried this myself, but .NET does have reasonably good support for URLs as paths. If not you will need to create a downloader stream and pass in your MP3 data as a stream.

Mark
